The db2 configuration failed and the following sql error still exists

com.ibm.db2.jcc.a.SqlException: DB2 SQL error: SQLCODE: -805, SQLSTATE: 51002, S
QLERRMC: NULLID.SYSLH203 0X5359534C564C3031

I ran the exact same command you typed (the password was different) and the command executed fine -- maybe there is a mistake in the command you typed - it looks you have a break at the "10,000" argument which is leaving out a fre arguments. Please enter the entire command in *one line*
Don't manually create 'Aperi' db before running 'cfgaperi'. The 'cfgaperi' will create and configure 'Aperi' db for you.
